definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: There was an evolution process in Zhou Gucheng s ancient history staging concept.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城的古史分期观有其演变过程。

sentences.english: At this point, identified on the staging of ancient history has reached its peak.
sentences.chinese: 至此，古史分期的论辨已达到高峰。

sentences.english: The Puranas talk about seven levels of the Netherworld .
sentences.chinese: 宇宙古史谈论了阴间世界的七个级别。

sentences.english: An adjudication of shuxiang" was a typical case in ancient history of China."
sentences.chinese: “叔向断狱”是古史记载中的一则典型案例。

definition: pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
three sovereigns 三皇[san1 huang2] and five emperors 五帝[wu3 di4] of myth and legend/the earliest system of Chinese historiography
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
